Name: Punch It Deluxe
About the game: Had a rough day you want to relieve? Or do you just want to have some violent fun? You can in this little arcade game. + PUNCH, PULL, TWIST to earn points and unlock all 3 stages. + Go crazy in 'Freemode' unleashing max damage on your foes as they make funny noises. + 6 intense beats to go along with your intense beatings.
